name: aki-sta
description: 空きスタサーチくん - モノリポ管理用

scripts.start:frontend: wait-on http://localhost:7071 && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:scraper && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:scraper:real: cd scraper && source venv/bin/activate && RUN_REAL_TESTS=true python -m pytest tests/test_dynamic_date.py::TestDynamicDateScraping::test_real_site_scraping -v -s
scripts.test:all: concurrently -n "backend,frontend,scraper,e2e,integration" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan" "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:scraper" "npm run test:e2e" "npm run test:integration"
